reviews.review: Lleno de cheaters y smurfs con Prime y sin Prime, pero es gratis y esta muy bueno jugar con amigos.
неплохая игра заслуживает того чобы поиграть
Simple mechanics, primitive yet excellent graphics, great margin for teamwork. I would only recommend the Prime version though.
Jest to fajna gra i tyle
Игра в которую я даже своему врагу не посоветую играть, но мне норм)
Не советую в неё играть, игры это зло, после убийств человечков на экране, вам придеться идти в ирл и там всех мочить, ведь именно так по версии новостных платформ всё и работает

Would recommend this game. Over all this is a great game but there is things wrong with it. One of the issues that the game has is if your playing comp if your high rank you will without a debt find cheaters. Another thing is non-prime or playing with a friend does not have prime and you do, there might be some cheaters but it depends on if you are playing comp or normal matches. But over its a fun game if you have prime if you don't your either someone that cant buy prime or your on a smurf and or your hacking.

issa great game no doubt it's just that the later updates kind of kill it because i don't have such a powerful PC and i used to play it on high while now i can only run it on low without the game lagging, all in all great game
Ну как же эту легенду не порекомендовать то :) Ни капли не жалею проведенное время в этой игре ;)

Alright so I think this game is really great! It feels really satisfying to play and i would really recommend it. There are some bugs but you can live with that. It's a lot more fun to play with your friends than alone. If you don't buy the game you will go against hackers. If you want to have a good gaming experience, you NEED to buy the game! It's kinda cheap and it's really worth it.
its fun game to spend with your friend i dont have much t say <3
